General.Name: Rodex Fasteners
General.Description: Rodex Fasteners Corp. engages in the processing, manufacturing, and trading of screws, precision stainless steel, and industrial screw products in Taiwan, the United States, Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company provides bolts, stainless steel wires, and components for precision hardware machinery, as well as operates and invests in related businesses. It is also involved in import and export activities. Rodex Fasteners Corp. was founded in 1984 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 29, Songjiang North Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
